DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate clinical outcome Intrastromal Corneal Ring Segment ( ICRS ) implantation correct high-degree astigmatism eye prior penetrate keratoplasty ( PK ) .
DOC.brief_title: Intrastromal Corneal Ring High Astigmatism Postkeratoplasty
DOC.detailed_description: Eighteen eye 18 patient , 8 men 10 woman , high level ( > 5 diopter [ D ] ) postkeratoplasty astigmatism study nonrandomized , retrospective , observational case series . Mean age time ICRS implantation 38 year , range 22 49 year . PK perform treat keratoconus 15 patient , corneal scar trauma 2 patient , Fuchs endothelial dystrophy 1 patient . All patient spectacle contact lens intolerant . There active corneal disease problem apart high astigmatism . Minimum time ICRS implantation 2 year PK least 6 month suture removal . Preoperative examination include personal medical ocular history , uncorrected visual acuity ( UCVA ) , best spectacle-corrected visual acuity ( BSCVA ) , refraction , keratometry , intraocular pressure ( IOP ) measurement applanation tonometry , corneal astigmatism , surface regularity index , surface asymmetry index , tonometry , slit-lamp biomicroscopy , specular microscopy , fundus examination . Main outcome measure include UCVA , BSCVA , refraction , keratometry computerized analysis corneal topography . All surgery perform surgeon ( BAN ) Goiania Eye Institute , July 2007 January 2009 . Corneal tunnel create mean mechanical dissection eye . Intrastromal corneal ring segment implantation indicate existence reduce best spectacle-corrected visual acuity ( BSCVA ) contact lens intolerance . Intracorneal ring segment implantation perform surgeon follow protocol . All eye implant Cornealring ( Visiontech Medical Optics , Belo Horizonte , MG , Brazil ) . Mean follow-up ICRS implantation 12 month ( range , 09 22 month ) . The procedure , goal , possible complication explain patient sign informed consent . The amount axis astigmatism correct ICRS base manifest refraction .
